channel.title: GD Graphics Library - Christoph M. Becker

item.title: LibGD 2.2.5 release
item.description:
The LibGD team is proud to announce the 2.2.5 release of libgd.

Security related fixes:

  • Double-free in gdImagePngPtr(). (CVE-2017-6362)
  • Buffer over-read into uninitialized memory. (CVE-2017-7890)

For full list of changes, see CHANGELOG.md.

This is a recommended update.

You can download the 2.2.5 version of GD â€¦
item.dc:creator: Christoph M. Becker
